name: Rocket Guardian
description:
ZOMBIES ARE FALLING ALONG THE CITY! As the Rocket Guardian, do your duty and destroy them all. This is an android game about a guardian that must protect a city from the falling zombies.

Source code and issue tracker: https://gitlab.com/atorresm/rocket-guardian
